PDE22E36FB877C574: ClickHouse (Xatu data). Sharded/replicated. MUST: fetch https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/xatu-data/master/llms.txt for context, filter by partition key, use CTEs, avoid GLOBAL JOINs. Schema at github.com/ethpandaops/xatu-data/schema/clickhouse/
P8E80F9AEF21F6940: Loki (container logs). MUST filter by label. Platform: k8s labels (ingress_user, container, pod, namespace). Devnets: `network` label, bare metal/docker.
P4169E866C3094E38: VictoriaMetrics (platform metrics). MUST filter by label (ingress_user, container, pod, namespace).
P3893C6D10EAD8176: Prometheus (devnet metrics). MUST filter by label. Use `network` label for devnet filtering.
